text: Montevideo is the capital and the largest city in Uruguay. It was founded by the Portuguese in 1717. Its best neighbourhood is called Carrasco. This neighbourhood is very exclusive due to its architectural styles. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Capitals of Uruguayan departments Category:1726 establishments Category:18th-century establishments in the Viceroyalty of Peru Category:18th-century establishments in Uruguay
title: Montevideo
